'''Taruithorn, The Oxford Tolkien Society''' is a [[Tolkien Societies|Tolkien society]] in England.

==History==
Taruithorn was founded in 1990<ref>{{webcite|articleurl=http://users.ox.ac.uk/~tolksoc/index.html|articlename=Homepage|website=[http://users.ox.ac.uk/~tolksoc/index.html Taruithorn]|accessed=20-06-2015}}</ref> in Oxford, England. It is both a [[Tolkien Society]] smial as well as an independent Tolkien society for students of [[Oxford University]].

==Events==
Taruithorn events are organized around the academic term.<ref>{{webcite|articleurl=http://users.ox.ac.uk/~tolksoc/termcard.html|articlename=Termcard|website=[http://users.ox.ac.uk/~tolksoc/index.html Taruithorn]|accessed=20-06-2015}}</ref>

==Publications==
Taruithorn publishes its magazine ''Miruvor'' on an irregular basis.

==External links==
* [http://users.ox.ac.uk/~tolksoc/ Official Website]
* [http://taruithornmiruvor.wordpress.com/ ''Miruvor''], magazine of Taruithorn
